data.title: How much do NOVAR CONTROLS Corp employees make?
data.meta_description: The average annual salary of NOVAR CONTROLS Corp is estimated to be approximate $96,662 per year. The majority pay is between $85,120 to $109,111 per year. Visit Salary.com to find out NOVAR CONTROLS Corp salary, NOVAR CONTROLS Corp pay rate, and more.
data.text:
1. How much does NOVAR CONTROLS Corp in the United States pay?

NOVAR CONTROLS Corp pays its employees an average of $96,662 per year. The average salary at NOVAR CONTROLS Corp range from $85,120 to $109,111 per year.

2. Do NOVAR CONTROLS Corp employees get a higher salary than other similar companies?

The salary at NOVAR CONTROLS Corp is lesser than HERKULES CONTROLS Corp. The highest salary package reported for an employee at NOVAR CONTROLS Corp is $109,111 per year, meanwhile the highest salary package reported for an employee at HERKULES CONTROLS Corp is $109,977 per year.
